title: Miles Davis - Complete "In A Silent Way" Sessions (200
description:

Miles Davis

The Complete In a Silent Way Sessions

(September 1968 - February 1969)


  3 CDs / 2004 / Remastered / 320Kbps


CD 1: 

1. Mademoiselle Mabry 

2. Frelon Brun 

3. Two Faced 

4. Dual Mr. Anthony Tillmon Williams Process 

5. Splash 

6. Splashdown [previously unreleased] 


CD 2:

2. Directions I 

3. Directions II 

4. Shhh/Peaceful [previously unreleased]

5. In A Silent Way (rehearsal) [previously unreleased]	

6. In A Silent Way [released for the first time in unedited form]

7. It's About That Time [released for the first time in unedited form]	


CD 3: 

1. The Ghetto Walk [previously unreleased]	

2. Early Minor [previously unreleased]	

3. Shhh/Peaceful (Album Version) 

4. In A Silent Way/It's About That Time (Album Version)

Recorded on September 24, November 11, 12, 25 & 27, 1968, and February 18 & 20, 1969.
